result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne dom
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne dom
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne domThanks for reminding me that.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as é sin a ċur i gcuiṁne domThanks for reminding me that.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.

result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ mo ċéad ċuairt ar Ṁeiriceá i gcuiṁne dom blianta fada ó ẛinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
